==Abilities==
''Most ability names are unofficial.''
{{Enemy Attacks
|enemy = Dendro Mitachurl

|name_1 = Crudewood Greatshield
|desc_1 = The Wooden Shieldwall Mitachurl is equipped with a {{Wood}} [[Shield/Enemy|shield]], which blocks incoming DMG from the direction that it is facing. can be burned and destroyed with {{Pyro}} unless it [[Elemental Reactions|reacts]] with another element.
* '''Extinguish:''' When the shield is burning, swings its shield around before smacking it with its hand to put out the fire.
|file_1 = Dendro Mitachurl Extinguish
|strat_1 = Use {{Pyro}} to burn down the shield. The shield is ineffective while the Mitachurl is performing an attack, creating an opening for the player. Alternatively, it can be bypassed if the Mitachurl is [[Frozen]].

|name_2 = Shield Charge
|file_2 = Dendro Mitachurl Shield Charge
|desc_2 = Charges towards the player with its shield, rapidly dealing '''50% ATK''' as {{Color|Black|Physical DMG}} to players in its path. At the end of the charge, swings its shield at the player, dealing an additional '''100% ATK''' as {{Color|Black|Physical DMG}}.

|name_3 = Charge
|file_3 = Dendro Mitachurl Charge
|desc_3 = When without its shield, charges towards the player character with brute force, rapidly dealing '''50% ATK''' as {{Color|Black|Physical DMG}} to players in its path.

|name_4 = Smack
|file_4 = Dendro Mitachurl Smack
|desc_4 = If the player strays too close, swings it shield or delivers a punch with its fist, dealing '''100% ATK''' or '''75% ATK''' as {{Color|Black|Physical DMG}}.
|caption_4 = Unshielded
|file_4_2 = Dendro Mitachurl Smack Shielded
|caption_4_2 = Shielded

|name_5 = Dendro Slime Throw
|desc_5 = If the player is at a different elevation or is out of range, the Mitachurl roars before digging a [[Dendro Slime]] out of the ground and throws it at the player, dealing '''50% ATK''' as {{Color|Black|Physical DMG}}.

|name_6 = Shield Recreation
|desc_6 = When without its shield, digs a Dendro Slime out of the ground to create a new shield.
}}

==Descriptions==
{{Description|A muscular hilichurl who has been forged in countless fights.<br>They know how to use Dendro Slimes to create tough shields which they wield in combat.<br>With their powerful muscles, glossy fur, and sturdy, reliable silhouettes, they help the hilichurls withstand the pitiless assaults of adventurers, and they hold a rather exalted rank amongst the tribes.|[[Archive]]}}
